h3_title: Yaoguai Chief - Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud
content: It will mainly shoot lasers from the smaller face on its chest and use projectiles. The way that these attacks appear can vary wildly from one laser at a time, to multiple in a criss-cross pattern. As for the projectiles, you'll see either a few larger balls of mist or multiple tiny ones sent your way.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud'.
The content is as follows:
It will mainly shoot lasers from the smaller face on its chest and use projectiles. The way that these attacks appear can vary wildly from one laser at a time, to multiple in a criss-cross pattern. As for the projectiles, you'll see either a few larger balls of mist or multiple tiny ones sent your way.
